author: Cmdr. Viper
title: Supply Run Interruption
content: Mechanical failure on C2 Hercules ramp. Repairs took 4 hours. No hostiles.

author: STR "Void"
title: Operation: Meeting Point Alpha
content: Enroute to rendevous with Void and Silenced, Chief Petty Officer D is intercepted by pirate forces. Making a quick decision, he ejects and watches as they lose interest in him. Sneaking aboard the Pirates Polaris Class Vessel, which was shocking empty to D's surprise. He set the vessel to Self Destruct before disembarking and evacuating to a safe range. Chief Petty Officer D didn't leave without saying goodbye, as he told the Pirates "Say goodbye to your Polaris" and heard their commotion over the coms. He was succesfully rescued and awarded the Sabotage Medal by Lieutenant Silenced.
